title: Adversarial Collaboration Update
summary:
Key ideas:
- Seven teams have registered for the adversarial collaboration contest.
- The author is giving others one more chance to sort out teams before the contest.
- The author has set a rule for only usernames A-M to propose topic and names N-Z to accept.

Key learnings:
- The contest is officially happening.
- The author is taking steps to ensure fairness and diversity of topics.

Key questions:
- Who else wants to propose a team and topic for the contest?
- Will the username rule help address the problem of participants not accepting each other's offers?
